name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 1, a large-scale public conflict broke out at OCT One in Chenghua District, Chengdu.
It is reported that the cause was that Phases 1 and 2 of the property were enclosed communities with good quality greenery, while Phase 3 was an open community without greenery.
In order to separate Phase 3 from their own community, the owners of Phases 1 and 2 jointly built a fence, which was strongly opposed by the owners of Phase 3, and a conflict broke out on the same day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/cURT354ynS

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, relevant departments entered the scene to maintain order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of the evening of April 1, the issue had not been resolved, and some people at the scene raised the national flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that some people were taken away at the scene and were blocked by the public. The security guards formed a human wall to maintain order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People surrounded a gray car to prevent the police and unidentified men from taking an old man away. People at the scene shouted "Let him go". Some people tried to stop the car with the national flag but failed. Then the car left.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens added a follow-up to the incident.
Before being acquired by OCT, the second phase contract of Sino Land had already made it clear that no partition walls would be built between the phased communities, and the relevant departments had also responded, making it clear that there were no partition walls between the phased communities.
The fence between the second and third phases of OCT was privately built by the owners of the second phase community after the third phase was delivered, and it blocked the fire pipes and gates of the third phase community, thus triggering today's conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The netizen later added that the person who was taken away was the owner of the second phase who beat people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The leaders of Chenghua District stated during the consultation that any fences erected privately would be demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added: During the daytime fence removal process, the owners of Phase 2 threw steel bars and rocks at the owners of Phase 3.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: Netizens added that Phases 1, 2 and 3 are all closed residential communities, not open communities as previously stated by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @wheat28476160 @BTTspeak Go back to China and book a room

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 2, a Hunan University student wrote that because Ma Ying-jeou will visit Hunan University today, the school requires students of this school not to leave their dormitories that morning, and students from other campuses not to go to this campus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @elonmusk @boriquagato I can't say

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Are we-media also on strike?
Recently, UP hosts at Bilibili have started a wave of suspension of updates. It is reported that because the revenue of videos at Bilibili has dropped significantly in recent years, the revenue of creators of a video with similar data to last year is only half or even one-third of that of last year.
Therefore, many UP hosts have recently announced that they will temporarily stop updating videos and will not upload new content in the short term.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Breaking news! On the evening of April 2, an indiscriminate hacking incident occurred near Guanyin Bridge in Chongqing. A man holding a kitchen knife randomly hacked passers-by and was subdued by the surrounding people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
